description: Alterations in connection with refurbishment throughout including replacement fenestration, insertion of rooflights, and insertion of window at rear second floor level. (See also planning application 2022/0054).
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The work to which this consent relates shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent. 
Reason: To comply with the requirements of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 and the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015.
Condition : 2 - The works of demolition/alteration hereby authorised shall be carried out in complete accordance with the following plans and specifications:
GA001, GA002, GA003, GA004, GA005, GA100, GA101, GA102, GA103, GA200, GA201, GA300, GA301, GA302, GA303, GA304, GA305, GA306, GA307, GA308, GA309, GA310, and GA3011 (all dated 5 August 2022).
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy DMS2 of the Development Management Policies Document (adopted March 2016).
Condition : 3 - No works shall take place until the following details have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:
a. a full schedule of repairs outlining the extent of works and repairs intended to be carried out;
b. as appropriate, a method statement for the works and repairs, outlining their scope and best practice; and
c. as appropriate, additional detailed drawings indicating the scope, location and details (such as elevation or section drawings) of the works and repairs.
The method statement required by b. shall be provided for the works identified as 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 12, 17, 19, 26, 27, 29, 30, 31, 32 and 34 on the approved drawings, as well as other works if deemed necessary by the local planning authority.
The additional detailed drawings required by c. shall be provided for the works identified as 3, 6, 19, 22, 23, 26, 27, 29, 31 and 32 on the approved drawings, as well as other works if deemed necessary by the local planning authority.
Works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details and thereafter so retained.
Reason: To safeguard the character of the building, in accordance with Council policy DMS2 of the Development Management Policies Document (adopted March 2016).
